content.question: In the period after circa 1450, trade along the routes shown on the map declined in large part because of the

choices.label: decrease in the demand for African manufactured goods in Europe
collapse of European economies in the wake of the bubonic plague
disruption caused by the adoption of new gunpowder weapons
increase of maritime trade along the African coast

content.answer: increase of maritime trade along the African coast

topic.text: 4.2: Exploration - Causes and Events from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
